code: import React,{useTransition}from"react";import{Link,useActionData}from"react-router-dom";import"./nav.css";import logo from'../photos/WinArtLOGO.png';import{FaBars}from"react-icons/fa";import{useState}from"react";import{ImCross}from"react-icons/im";import{FaHome}from"react-icons/fa";import{FaGuitar}from"react-icons/fa";import{FaShoppingCart}from"react-icons/fa";import{BsClipboard2CheckFill}from"react-icons/bs";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[Mobile,setMobile]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"nav-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logoName",children:"Winner Art"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:Mobile?"nav-links-mobile":"nav-links",onClick:()=>setMobile(false),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Acceuil"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/cours",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Ateliers"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/vente",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:" Instruments"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/inscriptions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"S'inscrire"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"lglg",children:"Login"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mobile-meni-icon",onClick:()=>setMobile(!Mobile),children:Mobile?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ImCross,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBars,{})})]});};export default Navbar;
